note:
Hello everyone :)
I am a postdoctoral research fellow at UCD in Ireland. I work with WP6 of the OPTED project on multilingual text analysis. Otherwise I mainly research political parties, representation, candidate selection, and TextAsData. I'm also neurodiverse and like to support others in academia. On my other social media accounts I mainly talk about TV and cats. Here I'll try and keep it about work. ðŸ¤“
